newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria ATX index ends at record high for 3rd day.
newsitem.headline: Austria ATX index ends at record high for 3rd day.

text.p: Austria's blue-chip ATX index ended at a record closing high for the third session on Tuesday, but was driven off earlier highs by a late flurry of profit-taking, traders said.
The ATX index of 21 blue chips closed 1.58 points, or 0.12 percent, higher at 1,310.7 with 10 stocks advancing, 10 falling and one unchanged by the close.
* Top ATX gainer cartonboard maker Mayr-Melnhof, up four percent at 627 ATS.
* Leading ATX decliner Bank Austria preferred, down 2.07 percent at 436 ATS.
* June ATX future flat at 1,311 points. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12256
